name: MobileMarketingBlog
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to periodic updates on Small Business Marketing from Mobile High Five. You will Learn insights and valuable tips to get more comfortable with SMS Text and Mobile Marketing. Just Ask Alexa, Play the latest from "Mobile High Five Blog"

Reach your customers directly and instantly with SMS Text and integrated loyalty programs. We have many additional tools you can add, such as curbside pick-up alerts, review management, review generation, mobile wallet notifications, guest wifi, and more! 

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
